title: Normals lobby/champ select incredibly buggy.
body:
In a team of 5, but only shows myself:
https://s17.postimg.org/8pft16ya7/Team5.jpg

Champ select; and also couldn't choose a champ:
https://s17.postimg.org/ecc5yo0sv/Champselect.jpg

replies.body: This will be fixed in the beta as they have said previously in the dev blogs. So far it has been improved immensely compared to 6 months ago, well done Riot you are doing really good. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

just to make sure just fill out a bug report. Here is the link... https://pbr.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en_AU/bugReport/create?app_name=LeagueClient&app_version=3159845-3241578&system_os=windows&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0%20(Windows%20NT%206.2%3B%20WOW64)%20AppleWebKit%2F537.36%20(KHTML%2C%20like%20Gecko)%20Chrome%2F49.0.2623.110%20Safari%2F537.36
